info.description:
Physical activity is often {boring} when done alone, as a remedy we created {Smart Dumbbells}.

Smart Dumbbells is a system that allows you to work out wherever you want in a {fun and engaging} way thanks to a personal virtual avatar that grows with you after every session, due to a continuous link with your smartphone üí™.

{Smart Dumbbells} is made of a 3D printed dumbbell equipped with a movement sensor, a Bluetooth transceiver and a rechargeable battery. The dumbbell is connected to a videogame for smartphone and PC, that allows you to have a visual feedback of your workout.
